text: hey everyone! new to HubSpot and going through the training videos. Trying to create a developer sandbox but I keep getting the spinning wheel when creating the account. Any ideas/help would be much appreciated! I have tried about 5 times in different browsers and incognito windows with no luck

Hey there <@U02SDDQ3B3N>, can you send me a link to the course/video that is linking off to create a sandbox account?

We recently changed the URL for creating a new sandbox account and I want to verify first that the link you’re going to is correct (I’ll get it fixed if it’s not, and point you to the correct one).

I am able to click create account, then it says welcome back! (i am logged in with my work email) I click "continue with this user" and that brings me to a page that says "it looks like you need to create an account". so I click start sign-up and that brings me to "what is your job/role?" i type web designer, and that is when it gives me the spinning wheel page that I cannot get past
oh sorry, i am able to get past one more page. I get to the page for giving my account a unique name. And thats when it spins
ahhh. Thank you this is helpful. I will report this to the team that owns that form.

Just updating you. I’m informing the team on this issue and trying to reproduce it myself. The URL you were going to is correct. It appears there’s potentially a bug happening somewhere in that onboarding flow.
ok thanks Jon. My organization was actually able to create an account for me, so I am all set now. but thank you so much for the help
sounds good. I tried going through the flow myself and didn’t encounter this issue. let me know if you have any further issues like this.

Reminder: Are you a developer new to HubSpot, looking to get started building on CMS Hub? Check out our <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started|quick start guide> to get a quick taste. When you’re ready to learn more head on over to our <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides|tutorials and guides> to learn by doing. When you’ve got a chance, we recommend looping back and reading the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/key-concepts|Key Concepts> of the CMS. It explains how all of the pieces of the CMS fit together. Welcome to HubSpot development, there’s never been a better time to be HubSpot developer!
